entry.title: SAP CodeJam Roadshow 2024
entry.content:
Yes, someone did say ‚ÄúRoadshow‚Äù!  Attention SAP Developers!  Thomas Jung and I are hitting the road again this year for another SAP CodeJam Roadshow in Europe.  Last year, we drove about 1500km around Germany and the Netherlands, I don‚Äôt think we will be doing that again anytime soon.  This time the roadshow is a bit more spread out geographically, so it will be planes and trains for us this time.   We will have 5 stops on the roadshow from April 12th through April 22nd 2024.  Below is a listing of the SAP CodeJam events on the roadshow schedule

04/12/2024     Amsterdam, Netherlands    

  • ABAP Cloud & RESTful Application Programming Model  Details and Registration

04/15/2024     Bucharest, Romania           

  • ABAP Cloud & RESTful Application Programming Model  Details and Registration

04/17/2024     Leverkusen, Germany         

  • ABAP Cloud & RESTful Application Programming Model  Details and Registration

04/19/2024     Paris, France                       

  • ABAP Cloud/RAP & CAP  Details and Registration

04/22/2024     Madrid, Spain                     

  • ABAP Cloud/RAP & CAP   Details and Registration        

I have a feeling these events will fill up fast, so if you want to join us for a day of coding awesomeness,  make sure to register to secure your seat.  I‚Äôd also like to take a second and thank our hosts for partnering with us on these events.  Thanks to PVH and Partners in Technology in Amsterdam,  IBM in Bucharest, Covestro in Leverkusen, VINCI Energies in Paris, and of course our own Antonio Maradiaga at SAP Espana in Madrid.

See you all somewhere in Europe on the roadshow!

Rich Heilman

entry.title: SAP Developer News, May 23rd, 2024
entry.content:
Mastering SAP Collaborate

Extension Architecture Guide:

  • SAP Application Extension Methodology: https://help.sap.com/docs/sap-btp-guidance-framework/sap-application-extension-methodology/sap-application-extension-methodology-overview?locale=en-US

SAP BTP ABAP Environment ‚Äì Release 2405

  • Blog post: https://community.sap.com/t5/technology-blogs-by-sap/sap-btp-abap-environment-release-2405/ba-p/13705247
  • Official Release Notes Page : https://help.sap.com/whats-new/7a822d3bcaa74f31b98fa315601e9c96?Version=ABAP%20Environment%202405&locale=en-US

 

Edge Integration Cell on K3S:

  • SAP Tech Bytes ‚Äì EIC playlist: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PHPPnma7Y1A&list=PL6RpkC85SLQAy8g4peerZFjOu9Hxf4TyZ

New Features for SAP Fiori elements for OData V4

  • Blog post: https://community.sap.com/t5/technology-blogs-by-sap/unlocking-efficiency-and-simplicity-a-look-into-the-new-features-of-sap/ba-p/13645297
  • Release notes: https://help.sap.com/whats-new/67f60363b57f4ac0b23efd17fa192d60?Category=SAP%20Fiori%20Elements&locale=en-US&Version=1.121

================================================================================

CHAPTER TITLES

0:00 Intro

0:08 Mastering SAP Collaborate

1:19 DYK ‚Äì CAP Plugins

2:08 Extension Architecture Guide

3:05 SAP BTP ABAP Environment ‚Äì Release 2405

4:25 Edge Integration Cell on K3S

5:25 New Features for SAP Fiori elements for OData V4

entry.title: SAP Developer News, June 4th 2024, Live from Sapphire!!!
entry.content:
Live from Sapphire Orlando!! 

  • https://www.sap.com/events/sapphire.html

Clean Core Strategy with New SAP Build and ABAP Cloud Features:

  • https://www.sap.com/products/technology-platform/developer-tools.html
  • https://www.sap.com/products/technology-platform/abap.html

SAP Commits to UNESCO Ethics in Artificial Intelligence Principles:

  •  https://www.sap.com/india/products/artificial-intelligence/ai-ethics.html

New SAP BTP Solution Diagrams and Reference Architectures Speed Adoption:

  • GitHub link: https://sap.github.io/btp-solution-diagrams/
  • Blog post: https://community.sap.com/t5/technology-blogs-by-sap/getting-started-with-sap-btp-solution-diagram/ba-p/13616548
  • Examples: https://sap.github.io/btp-solution-diagrams/docs/btp_guideline/examples/
  • Reference Architectures: https://discovery-center.cloud.sap/refArchCatalog/
  • SAP BTP Guidance Framework: https://help.sap.com/docs/sap-btp-guidance-framework/guidance-framework/what-is-sap-btp-guidance-framework
  •  Anomaly Detection Reduces Security and Performance Risks in SAP Integration Suite: https://www.sap.com/events/sapphire/news-guide/business-technology-platform.html#sap-integration-suite-capabilities

=====================================================================

CHAPTER TITLES

0:00 Intro

0:08 Live from Sapphire Orlando!

0:40 Clean Core Strategy with New SAP Build and ABAP Cloud Features

3:53 SAP Commits to UNESCO Ethics in Artificial Intelligence Principles

5:07 New SAP BTP Solution Diagrams and Reference Architectures Speed Adoption

6:07 Anomaly Detection Reduces Security and Performance Risks in SAP Integration Suite

TRANSCRIPT

[Nora] Welcome to the developer news. We are here on day 2 of Sapphire. Right on the show floor behind me you see the business AI booth with the Apple Vision Pro. And there are lots of cool AI sessions here. We saw a lot of cool announcements. My personal highlight was Philip Herzig performing with an actual guitar and singing. So that was pretty cool. And yeah, enjoy the news.

[Rekha] Hello everybody. Are you ready for this? SAP has announced the ongoing extensive integration of Joule, the generative AI copilot, throughout the enterprise portfolio, as well as technology platforms. By quickly sorting and contextualizing data from multiple systems onto the surface, giving smart insights, Joule helps people get their work done faster and also drive better business decisions. Joule was announced in September last year with initial integrations with SAP Success Factors and SAP Start. Since then, SAP has integrated Joule into SAP S4 HANA Cloud Public Edition, SAP S4 HANA Cloud Private Edition, as well as multiple products like SAP Digital Supply Chain, SAP customer data platform, SAP BTP Cockpit, SAP Build, SAP Build Code, and SAP Integration Suite. In the second half of 2024, Joule is also planned to be available in SAP Ariba and SAP Analytics Cloud. Additionally, Joule will be able to understand and respond to queries in a growing number of languages, including German, Spanish, French, and Portuguese, making it even more useful for global organizations. If you are a business analyst, IT professional, or a process owner, you can rapidly automate business processes at scale using Joule. Joule integration with SAP Build Process Automation allows you to generate automations and workflows using natural language requests in addition to the standard no code visual editor. Customers using SAP Integration Suite can create integration flows and connect to any application using simple natural language with Joule. If you are an SAP BTP compliance professional, you can use regulatory change manager tool on SAP BTP by leveraging Joule to evaluate vast number of regulatory updates. You can also do impact analysis across SAP products solutions, maintaining compliance, and running day-to-day businesses without disruptions. Joule integration for ABAP cloud, both SAP S4HANA public as well as private, will be made available for early adopters and will let developers accelerate ABAP development. This capability is planned to be generally available in the second half of this year. Joule-powered SAP Build code now lets you to be more agile by building Fiori front-ends to the SAP S4 HANA Cloud systems, thus simplifying extensions. We hope this update has delighted you. Thank you.

[Shrini] SAP is bringing new consulting capabilities to Joule; it's generative AI co-pilot aimed at simplifying SAP implementations for partners. The new consulting capability for Joule draws insights from SAP product documentation and the SAP community to provide consultants with vital information through natural language interactions. This capability is especially critical for supporting customers transitioning to SAP S4 on our cloud as part of Rise with SAP program, helping to accelerate implementation projects and save money. Joule's new consulting capabilities have been tested through multiple SAP certification Exams. Pricewater, Coopers, and Deloitte, having evaluated the upgraded features, are set to deploy the capabilities for more efficient execution. This advancement is expected to reduce time and resource use for their clients moving to a rise with SAP solutions, demonstrating the traction and value of tools and handspills. This capability is planned to be available in the second half of this year.

[Sheena] The new certification program for IT professionals responsible for SAP S4 HANA Cloud implementation is now available on SAP Learning Hub. This program certifies that implementation project members possess the core skills required to explain and execute core implementation tasks. This includes deploying, adopting, and extending SAP S4 HANA Cloud Public Edition. SAP certification programs gives employers confidence that they are hiring the best talent for the digital transformation and allows IT professionals to distinguish themselves with a highly recognized accreditation.

entry.title: üáßüá™ SAP CodeJam ABAP Cloud (Ghent, Belgium)
entry.content:
REGISTRATION FOR THIS EVENT IS NOW CLOSED!!!

This SAP CodeJam event is on the topic of the ABAP Cloud Development Model in SAP S/4HANA.  

We will give you an introduction about the ABAP Cloud Development in an SAP S/4HANA on-premise environment which is available in SAP S/4HANA as of release 2022. The fundamental principle is that ABAP cloud-ready and ABAP classic code can coexist in the same system since the ABAP language version is defined on ABAP object level. This offers a gradual transition from the classic to the cloud extensibility model.

For this workshop we will provide you with access to system running on release SAP S/4HANA 2023 FSP01.

To understand the basic idea of ABAP Cloud Development you will learn how to:

- Use the ABAP RESTful Application Programming Model (RAP) to develop transactional Fiori applications

- Use public SAP APIs released by SAP to access SAP functionality and SAP data

- Use public SAP extension points released by SAP to extend SAP objects

- Use ADT (ABAP Development Tools) as your ABAP IDE

With the SAP S/4HANA 2022 release the same extensibility model can now be used in SAP S/4HANA Cloud, Private Edition, and SAP S/4HANA.

This is an in-person event only (not virtual) and is planned for 29 October 2024 in Ghent, Belgium from 9:30 - 15:00 CET. The language of the event and the content will be English. 

Address:   

d'Office Gent

Poortakkerstraat 93, 1st floor

9051 Ghent

The instructor is Andre Fischer

The event is kindly being hosted by delaware, thank you! Please note that spaces are limited - we can only accommodate 25 attendees. 

Please find the prerequisites for this event here.

For more information on SAP CodeJam events, to ask questions, and to chat with your fellow attendees, head over to the SAP CodeJam group.

entry.title: üá¶üáπ SAP CodeJam ABAP Cloud (Vienna, Austria)
entry.content:
THIS EVENT IS NOW AT CAPACITY AND REGISTRATION IS NOW CLOSED!!!!

This SAP CodeJam event is on the topic of the ABAP Cloud, and specifically introduces attendees to ABAP Cloud and the ABAP RESTful Application Programming Model. ABAP Cloud is the ABAP based development model for S/4HANA Cloud, S/4HANA on premise, and SAP BTP, ABAP environment. Learn how to use proven and new technologies, such as Core Data Services (CDS) and behavior definition and implementation languages, to build SAP Fiori apps and OData services on any of the ABAP Cloud options. In this hands-on experience, developers will create their first ABAP applications using ABAP Cloud, expose and consume services via HTTP, and explore the ABAP RESTful Application Programming Model.

This is an in-person event only (not virtual) and is planned for Friday 08 November 2024 in Vienna, Austria  from 09:00 - 16:00 GMT+1. The language of the event and the content will be English. 

Location: SCC EDV-Beratung AG, Mantlergasse 30-32, 1130 Vienna, Austria
The instructor is Lukas Bretschneider

Here are essential prerequisites that must be completed by every attendee, before arriving at the event location. They are documented here: abap-exercises-codejam/prerequisites.md at main ¬∑ SAP-samples/abap-exercises-codejam (github.com).

The event is kindly being hosted by SCC EDV-Beratung AG, thank you! Please note that spaces are limited - we can only accommodate 30 attendees. Register here in the Community Event using the RSVP functionality.

For more information on SAP CodeJam events, to ask questions, and to chat with your fellow attendees, head over to the SAP CodeJam group.

 

SAP Managed Tags:

SAP BTP, ABAP environment,

 SAP S/4HANA Cloud ABAP Environment,
ABAP RESTful Application Programming Model

entry.title: üáµüá± SAP CodeJam ABAP Cloud (Warsaw, Poland)
entry.content:
his SAP CodeJam event is on the topic of the ABAP Cloud Development Model in SAP S/4HANA.  

We will give you an introduction about the ABAP Cloud Development in an SAP S/4HANA on-premise environment which is available in SAP S/4HANA as of release 2022. The fundamental principle is that ABAP cloud-ready and ABAP classic code can coexist in the same system since the ABAP language version is defined on ABAP object level. This offers a gradual transition from the classic to the cloud extensibility model.

For this workshop we will provide you with access to system running on release SAP S/4HANA 2023 FSP01.

To understand the basic idea of ABAP Cloud Development you will learn how to:

- Use the ABAP RESTful Application Programming Model (RAP) to develop transactional Fiori applications

- Use public SAP APIs released by SAP to access SAP functionality and SAP data

- Use public SAP extension points released by SAP to extend SAP objects

- Use ADT (ABAP Development Tools) as your ABAP IDE

With the SAP S/4HANA 2022 release the same extensibility model can now be used in SAP S/4HANA Cloud, Private Edition, and SAP S/4HANA.
